description: This file defines a Java record named BaggageBeltResponse representing the response payload for baggage belt information in a flight status service. It includes metadata annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: BaggageBeltResponse
classes.description: A Java record serving as a data transfer object (DTO) for baggage belt response information, including id, beltCode, terminal, active status, createdAt, and updatedAt timestamps.
